    CFS Command and Data Dictionary scheduler input interface

    • Method Detail

      • getVariableRelativeIndex

        int getVariableRelativeIndex(CcddClassesDataTable.Variable variable,
                             java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.Variable> variables)
        Get the index at which the specified variable should be inserted in the list of variables provided
        Parameters:
        variable - variable for which to determine the insertion index
        variables - list of variables into which the variable is to be inserted
        Returns:
        Index at which to insert the target variable; -1 if the provided list is empty and -2 if the variable is already in the list

      • getSelectedVariableSize

        int getSelectedVariableSize(java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.Variable> variables)
        Get the size of the variable or link that is selected
        Parameters:
        variables - list of variables; null to use the currently selected variables
        Returns:
        Size in bytes of the variable or link

      • getVariablesAtRate

        java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.Variable> getVariablesAtRate(java.lang.String rate)
        Get a list of variable/applications at the specified rate
        Parameters:
        rate - rate column name
        Returns:
        List of variable objects representing the variables/applications at the specified rate
